title: Embalming hand
name: embalming_hand
description:
A massive hand located in the middle of embalming lake [1]. The band of TEMP, as well as haveron [2], aalina [3], were summoned on each finger of the hand. 
 It seemingly has an ability to move, as it lowered the adventurers after they regained their consciousness down to the lake.
origin: Unknown, but said to have association to way of hand
